verses.verse: I will give thanks<WH3034> to Yahweh<WH3068> with my whole heart.<WH3820> I will tell<WH5608> of all your marvelous works.<WH6381>
I will be glad<WH8055> and rejoice<WH5970> in you.<WH2167> I will sing praise to your name,<WH8034> O Most High.<WH5945>
When my enemies<WH341> turn<WH7725> back,<WH268> they stumble<WH3782> and perish<WH6> in your presence.<WH6440>
For you have maintained<WH6213> my just<WH4941> cause.<WH1779> You sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> judging<WH8199> righteously.<WH6664>
You have rebuked<WH1605> the nations.<WH1471> You have destroyed<WH6> the wicked.<WH7563> You have blotted out<WH4229> their name<WH8034> forever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5769>
The enemy<WH341> is overtaken<WH2723> by endless<WH5331> ruin.<WH8552> The very memory<WH2143> of the<WH1992> cities<WH6145> which you have overthrown<WH5428> has perished.<WH6>
But Yahweh<WH3068> reigns<WH3427> forever.<WH5769> He has prepared<WH3559> his throne<WH3678> for judgment.<WH4941>
He will judge<WH8199> the world<WH8398> in righteousness.<WH6664> He will administer judgment<WH1777> to the peoples<WH3816> in uprightness.<WH4339>
Yahweh<WH3068> will also be a high tower<WH4869> for the oppressed;<WH1790> a high tower<WH4869> in times<WH6256> of trouble.<WH6869>
Those who know<WH3045> your name<WH8034> will put their trust<WH982> in you,<WH3068> for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken<WH5800> those who seek you.<WH1875>
Sing praises<WH2167> to Yahweh,<WH3068> who dwells<WH3427> in Zion,<WH6726> and declare<WH5046> among the people<WH5971> what he has done.<WH5949>
For he who avenges<WH1875> blood<WH1818> remembers<WH2142> them.<WH7911> He doesn't forget the cry<WH6818> of the afflicted.<WH6035>
Have mercy<WH2603> on me,<WH3068> Yahweh. See<WH7200> my affliction<WH6040> by those who hate<WH8130> me,<WH7311> and lift me up from the gates<WH8179> of death;<WH4194>
that I may show forth<WH5608> all your praise.<WH8416> In the gates<WH8179> of the daughter<WH1323> of Zion,<WH6726> I will rejoice<WH1523> in your salvation.<WH3444>
The nations<WH1471> have sunk down<WH2883> in the pit<WH7845> that they made.<WH6213> In the net<WH7568> which<WH2098> they hid,<WH2934> their own foot<WH7272> is taken.<WH3920>

Yahweh<WH3068> has made himself known.<WH3045> He has executed<WH6213> judgment.<WH4941> The wicked<WH7563> is snared<WH5367> by the work<WH6467> of his own hands.<WH3709> Meditation.<WH1902> Selah.<WH5542>
The wicked<WH7563> shall be turned<WH7725> back to Sheol,<WH7585> even all the nations<WH1471> that forget<WH7913> God.<WH430>
For the needy<WH34> shall not always<WH5331> be forgotten,<WH7911> nor the hope<WH8615> of the poor<WH6041> perish<WH6> forever.<WH5703>
Arise,<WH6965> Yahweh!<WH3068> Don't<WH582> let man prevail.<WH5810> Let the nations<WH1471> be judged<WH8199> in your sight.<WH6440>
Put<WH7896> them in fear,<WH4172> Yahweh.<WH3068> Let the nations<WH1471> know<WH3045> that they are only men.<WH582> Selah.<WH5542>
